thread.title: Tee up or stay cool in the pool at PGA National
thread.title_full: Tee up or stay cool in the pool at PGA National | www.palmbeachpost.com

author: Mary Thurwachter
title: Tee up or stay cool in the pool at PGA National
text:
Pack your swimsuit and golf clubs for a close-to-home getaway at the PGA National Resort & Spa. Summer is a good time to go because guests who book two nights can get a third night free.
The resort recently underwent a multimillion-dollar renovation and offers golf, tennis, restaurants and a soothing spa. But you can just chill around the pool if that better suits you!
During weekends this summer, guests will find Saturday barbecues, a music series, festivals and kids camps.
For reservations or information, call 855-969-2869 or visit www.pgaresort.com .
</span
